name: RZ bKash Pay for woo-commerce
author: Rezwan Shiblu

sections.description:
Bangladesh Bkash payment gateway extention for woo-commerce

Using the Plugin

  • Download the plugin, install and active.

  • Now go to WooCommerce > Settings > bKash, location URL would be like below –

    http://yourwebsite.domain/wp-admin/admin.php?page=wc-settings&tab=checkout&section=rz_bkash

  • Now you will see few default setup.
sections.installation:
You may install the plugin using one of the three following methods:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Then activate the plugin.
  3. Go to woocommerce > settings > payment > bKash.
sections.faq:
What is bKash?

bKash is the fastest and safest medium of financial transaction, bKash makes your life simple with Send Money, Add Money, Pay Bill, Mobile Recharge, Payment and many more services. It maintain by Bangladesh Bank as a subsidiary of BRAC Bank Limited (bKash).

Is it Woocommerce dependent plugin?

Yes, You must install and active woocommerce plugin to make this plugin work.

Is bKash merchant account necessary?

No, it could be personal or agent account.

Is is secured?

Yes definitely, Maintained high level validation in both frontend and backend.
